entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
